name: Trains On Rails
description:
A puzzle game involving trains going through portals. Connect two gates to activate the portals. Send the train with the to the station with the corresponding color. 5 levels total. 

My role in development:

  • Collaborated with paper designing levels 1-5.
  • Implemented levels 1-5 in the engine. (Setting down tiles, assigning objects/prefabs to scripts, reading code as it is being made and implementing them to the levels)
  • Created scripts to handle explosions, music, and edited scripts to add sound cues and to remove bugs.

Made in Unity.
